item.title: Scrum process
item.description: I am a big fan of the Agile development process. I am also a big fan of Scrum. This is the typical set of ceremonies that we use to organize: Standup When Duration Location Every day 10’ Zoom Channel or Team area This is the typical 10 minute meeting where we share our updates. The standup has been scheduled early in the morning so that we can kick-start the day with having a plan in mind or focus on solving any blockers awaiting from the previous day.
